dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 59,684 politically tinted tweets from US-based users, collected between January 1, 2020, and April 3, 2020, with corresponding inter-user follow relations and 3,822 tweets manually annotated with stance labels.
dcterms:title: StanceUS

dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 176,619 politically tinted tweets from India-based users, collected between October 26, 2019, and March 2, 2020, with corresponding inter-user follow relations and 4,185 tweets manually annotated with stance labels.
dcterms:title: StanceIN
